11#include "modules/remote_bitrate_estimator/overuse_detector.h"
12
13#include <math.h>
14#include <stdio.h>
15
16#include <algorithm>
17#include <string>
18
19#include "modules/remote_bitrate_estimator/test/bwe_test_logging.h"
20#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
21#include "rtc_base/numerics/safe_minmax.h"
22
23namespace webrtc {
24
25const char kAdaptiveThresholdExperiment[] = "WebRTC-AdaptiveBweThreshold";
26const char kEnabledPrefix[] = "Enabled";
27const size_t kEnabledPrefixLength = sizeof(kEnabledPrefix) - 1;
28const char kDisabledPrefix[] = "Disabled";
29const size_t kDisabledPrefixLength = sizeof(kDisabledPrefix) - 1;
30
31const double kMaxAdaptOffsetMs = 15.0;
32const double kOverUsingTimeThreshold = 10;
33const int kMaxNumDeltas = 60;
34
35bool AdaptiveThresholdExperimentIsDisabled(
36 const WebRtcKeyValueConfig& key_value_config) {
37 std::string experiment_string =
38 key_value_config.Lookup(kAdaptiveThresholdExperiment);
39 const size_t kMinExperimentLength = kDisabledPrefixLength;
40 if (experiment_string.length() < kMinExperimentLength)
41 return false;
42 return experiment_string.substr(0, kDisabledPrefixLength) == kDisabledPrefix;
43}
44
45// Gets thresholds from the experiment name following the format
46// "WebRTC-AdaptiveBweThreshold/Enabled-0.5,0.002/".
47bool ReadExperimentConstants(const WebRtcKeyValueConfig& key_value_config,
48 double* k_up,
49 double* k_down) {
50 std::string experiment_string =
51 key_value_config.Lookup(kAdaptiveThresholdExperiment);
52 const size_t kMinExperimentLength = kEnabledPrefixLength + 3;
53 if (experiment_string.length() < kMinExperimentLength ||
54 experiment_string.substr(0, kEnabledPrefixLength) != kEnabledPrefix)
55 return false;
56 return sscanf(experiment_string.substr(kEnabledPrefixLength + 1).c_str(),
57 "%lf,%lf", k_up, k_down) == 2;
58}
59
60OveruseDetector::OveruseDetector(const WebRtcKeyValueConfig* key_value_config)
61 // Experiment is on by default, but can be disabled with finch by setting
62 // the field trial string to "WebRTC-AdaptiveBweThreshold/Disabled/".
63 : in_experiment_(!AdaptiveThresholdExperimentIsDisabled(*key_value_config)),
64 k_up_(0.0087),
65 k_down_(0.039),
66 overusing_time_threshold_(100),
67 threshold_(12.5),
68 last_update_ms_(-1),
69 prev_offset_(0.0),
70 time_over_using_(-1),
71 overuse_counter_(0),
72 hypothesis_(BandwidthUsage::kBwNormal) {
73 if (!AdaptiveThresholdExperimentIsDisabled(*key_value_config))
74 InitializeExperiment(*key_value_config);
75}
76
77OveruseDetector::~OveruseDetector() {}
78
79BandwidthUsage OveruseDetector::State() const {
80 return hypothesis_;
81}
82
83BandwidthUsage OveruseDetector::Detect(double offset,
84 double ts_delta,
85 int num_of_deltas,
86 int64_t now_ms) {
87 if (num_of_deltas < 2) {
88 return BandwidthUsage::kBwNormal;
89 }
90 const double T = std::min(num_of_deltas, kMaxNumDeltas) * offset;
91 BWE_TEST_LOGGING_PLOT(1, "T", now_ms, T);
92 BWE_TEST_LOGGING_PLOT(1, "threshold", now_ms, threshold_);
93 if (T > threshold_) {
94 if (time_over_using_ == -1) {
95 // Initialize the timer. Assume that we've been
96 // over-using half of the time since the previous
97 // sample.
98 time_over_using_ = ts_delta / 2;
99 } else {
100 // Increment timer
101 time_over_using_ += ts_delta;
102 }
103 overuse_counter_++;
104 if (time_over_using_ > overusing_time_threshold_ && overuse_counter_ > 1) {
105 if (offset >= prev_offset_) {
106 time_over_using_ = 0;
107 overuse_counter_ = 0;
108 hypothesis_ = BandwidthUsage::kBwOverusing;
109 }
110 }
111 } else if (T < -threshold_) {
112 time_over_using_ = -1;
113 overuse_counter_ = 0;
114 hypothesis_ = BandwidthUsage::kBwUnderusing;
115 } else {
116 time_over_using_ = -1;
117 overuse_counter_ = 0;
118 hypothesis_ = BandwidthUsage::kBwNormal;
119 }
120 prev_offset_ = offset;
121
122 UpdateThreshold(T, now_ms);
123
124 return hypothesis_;
125}
126
127void OveruseDetector::UpdateThreshold(double modified_offset, int64_t now_ms) {
128 if (!in_experiment_)
129 return;
130
131 if (last_update_ms_ == -1)
132 last_update_ms_ = now_ms;
133
134 if (fabs(modified_offset) > threshold_ + kMaxAdaptOffsetMs) {
135 // Avoid adapting the threshold to big latency spikes, caused e.g.,
136 // by a sudden capacity drop.
137 last_update_ms_ = now_ms;
138 return;
139 }
140
141 const double k = fabs(modified_offset) < threshold_ ? k_down_ : k_up_;
142 const int64_t kMaxTimeDeltaMs = 100;
143 int64_t time_delta_ms = std::min(now_ms - last_update_ms_, kMaxTimeDeltaMs);
144 threshold_ += k * (fabs(modified_offset) - threshold_) * time_delta_ms;
145 threshold_ = rtc::SafeClamp(threshold_, 6.f, 600.f);
146 last_update_ms_ = now_ms;
147}
148
149void OveruseDetector::InitializeExperiment(
150 const WebRtcKeyValueConfig& key_value_config) {
151 RTC_DCHECK(in_experiment_);
152 double k_up = 0.0;
153 double k_down = 0.0;
154 overusing_time_threshold_ = kOverUsingTimeThreshold;
155 if (ReadExperimentConstants(key_value_config, &k_up, &k_down)) {
156 k_up_ = k_up;
157 k_down_ = k_down;
158 }
159}
160} // namespace webrtc
